sentences: Louis Frausto PÃ©rez, Jr. (born January 29, 1953) is an American songwriter, percussionist and guitarist for Los Lobos and Latin Playboys.
In 1990, Victor Bisetti was hired to be a combination drum tech, drum coach and percussionist.
Bisetti was replaced in 2003 by Ruben (Cougar) Estrada.
Estrada was replaced by Enrique "Bugs" Gonzalez in 2013.
